<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Attentive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Designli has received positive feedback regarding their attentiveness and responsiveness. Clients noted that Designli&#39;s team actively engages in discussions, asking insightful questions to ensure a thorough understanding of project needs. One client emphasized their patience during lengthy meetings, while another highlighted their immediate responses to inquiries. Overall, clients find Designli&#39;s approach professional and accommodating, fostering effective communication and collaboration throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App UI/UX Design & Dev for AI Storage Startup</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 16, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Designli’s project management is great. We always have weekly meetings, and we have to reschedule them from time to time, but this isn’t a problem because they’re <b>truly attentive</b>. They always ask many questions and seek more details to fully understand what I need. This helps them execute tasks properly—their developers even join many of our meetings. They remain patient even if our meetings go for over an hour.
            </p>
          </div>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Patient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall sentiment regarding Developer Bazaar Technologies reflects a high level of satisfaction, particularly emphasizing their patience and responsiveness. A client noted their &#39;response, patient and good business and technical knowledge,&#39; highlighting the expertise of their staff. The project management was described as &#39;fantastic, responsive and friendly,&#39; contributing to a positive experience. The only minor suggestion for improvement was to diversify communication tools beyond Skype.
      </p>

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a positive sentiment regarding Inspeerity&#39;s openness to feedback, highlighting their flexibility in resource allocation, which allowed for adjustments based on project needs. One client noted, &#34;They’re open for discussions when it comes to allocations,&#34; reflecting their willingness to adapt. Overall, the feedback indicates that Inspeerity maintains a professional approach, fostering effective communication and collaboration, contributing to successful project outcomes.
      </p>

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="1388267"

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Project Management for Telecommunication Solutions Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 23, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              For whatever reason, if we needed to have a discussion about a particular deadline or timeline, this discussion was handled in a very professional way with the customer. This allowed us to make sure we had an agreement with the customer if any timelines were to be shifted. <b>They’re open for discussions when it comes to allocations.</b> Sometimes, we didn’t have a need to allocate him full-time and <b>they were willing to let Karol work a limited number of hours per day or per week.</b> Inspeerity was <b>very willing and easy to adjust when it came to the allocation of resources</b> and that is something that we appreciate.
            </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Exceptional results
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Wve Labs for delivering exceptional results and high-quality work. One client noted their &#39;unparalleled&#39; efficiency and customer care, highlighting prompt communication and a clear scope of work. Another praised the team for quickly grasping their vision and producing a functional, aesthetically pleasing app that exceeded expectations. Overall, sentiment reflects satisfaction with project management, timely delivery, and a commitment to client success, reinforcing Wve Labs&#39; reputation as a reliable development partner.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="75392"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="109904"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1898447"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS Development for Mobile Portfolio Application</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 9, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I needed a logo as well as a complete design. I told the project manager the colors I wanted and it was incredible to see what they presented to me two days later. <b>There were six different options and there was one that really stuck out to me</b>. We made a couple of iterations, but I was expecting it to take longer than it did. The screens were also done quickly with very few iterations. I was surprised <b>how fast they could create stunning designs for my app</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

Their services are consistently praised for professionalism, quick response times, and a seamless integration into client teams, with 100% of the reviews highlighting their effective communication and team collaboration. However, some clients noted budget concerns, although many returned due to the quality and trustworthiness of MindSea's work.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Customized support
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have praised MindSea for their customized support, highlighting the professionalism and friendliness of the team. One client noted the service felt &#39;bespoke and personalized,&#39; emphasizing the clear communication and tailored project management. They reported that MindSea exceeded their expectations in meeting project needs, with no areas for improvement identified. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the attentive and individualized support provided throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>

            </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accessible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback highlights CodeLions&#39; exceptional accessibility and communication. Clients noted their promptness and availability, with one stating, &#34;they were always available&#34; and another praising their &#34;transparency and ease to work with.&#34; Regular meetings and effective use of tools like Slack and G-meet facilitated ongoing discussions. Clients felt supported throughout their projects, which contributed to a positive experience, as reflected in the sentiment that they were &#34;very satisfied&#34; with the collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>

            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Jafton"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Jafton"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Jafton is a dedicated Mobile App Development company specializing in creating and enhancing mobile applications with a strong emphasis on performance, user experience, and integration. Across various reviews, 100% of clients praised their responsive project management and technical skills, highlighting their ability to deliver on time and adapt to client needs efficiently. Although some clients noted areas for improvement in initial project planning and documentation, the overall feedback is overwhelmingly positive, with clients reporting increased user engagement and satisfaction post-collaboration.

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
              data-gtm_insight_id="974990"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Jafton&#39;s clients consistently express high satisfaction regarding their accommodating nature. Feedback highlights Jafton&#39;s ability to adapt quickly to changing project requirements and maintain clear communication. One client noted, &#34;Jafton quickly adapted to changes and made sure our vision was perfectly executed,&#34; while another remarked on their team fitting seamlessly into existing operations. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Jafton&#39;s responsiveness and flexibility, with no significant areas for improvement identified by clients.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="302006"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974990"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">IT Staff Augmentation for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 21, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Working with Jafton was great—they consistently delivered on time, communicated clearly, <b>quickly adapted to changes</b>, and made sure our vision for the app was perfectly executed. I was most impressed by Jafton's clear communication and <b>quick adaptability</b>, which ensured our project stayed perfectly aligned with our vision.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/jafton/302006"
            title="View Jafton Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="302006"
            data-gtm_insight_id="974990"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="295778"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974990"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Staff Augmentation for Software Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 20, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Jafton's team managed the project well, delivering on time, communicating clearly, <b>adapting quickly</b>, and using tools to stay on track and address issues promptly. I was really impressed with how easily Jafton's developers became part of our team. They communicated clearly, <b>adapted quickly to our needs</b>, and managed the project efficiently.
            </p>
          </div>

        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="912548"
          data-gtm_index="2"
          data-gtm_review_id="295313"
          data-gtm_insight_id="974990"

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Transparent
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently commend Grey Chain for their transparency throughout project engagements. One client noted their &#39;incredibly transparent and honest&#39; pricing, ensuring no unnecessary charges. Another highlighted their &#39;transparent&#39; communication regarding timelines and progress, with regular updates provided. Overall, feedback reflects a strong sentiment of trust and clarity in interactions, with clients appreciating their responsiveness and willingness to adapt to specific needs.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Ideamotive for their accommodating nature throughout project engagements. One client noted their willingness to address concerns and adapt to changing requirements, stating, &#34;They will be able to accommodate just about any situation you could possibly find yourselves in with them as your partner.&#34; This sentiment was echoed by another client who appreciated the team&#39;s proactive communication and commitment to collaboration, making the experience feel like a partnership rather than a contract.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="57708"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="118381"
          data-gtm_insight_id="785920"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Backend Development for Entertainment SaaS Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 22, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They were absolutely excellent to work with. It was my first experience working with an offshore company, so I was a little bit more reticent at the beginning of the project, but they took away any angst that I might have had about the time difference or any other communication issues. <b>They make the collaboration feel like a partnership rather than a contract.</b> The attitude that they brought every day made the project incredibly enjoyable to work on and manage.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Feedback regarding Steamclock Software&#39;s results-oriented approach is overwhelmingly positive. Clients noted timely and consistent delivery of complex features, such as multi-factor authentication and live trading capabilities. One client emphasized the agile project management style, highlighting that all work was completed within deadlines while meeting both business and technical requirements. The culture of the team was also praised, contributing to an environment that fosters effective problem-solving and engagement.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="198077"
          data-gtm_insight_id="725608"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design, Dev & Maintenance for Investing Platform</h5>

              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 28, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Project management appears very agile and <b>focused on delivering results</b>. Work was always completed within established deadlines. Business and technical requirements were always met. <b>Testing is also thorough and accountable</b>. The communication style and habits are conducive to a fun experience where the project never gets off track.

    data-title="Devsinc"

    
        data-uid="993c8538-580b-49e2-91cf-6b389de9a036"
        data-id="1755717"
        data-type="featured"
        data-position="11"

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"

              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Results-oriented
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Results-oriented
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Memory Squared demonstrates a strong results-oriented approach, as evidenced by their successful redesign of a complex food ordering system within six months. Clients praised their ability to quickly grasp the business model and effectively implement unique personalization features without major complications. The collaboration was characterized by systematic meetings that fostered creativity and a supportive workflow. Overall, clients express satisfaction with the results and plan to continue their partnership for further development.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="172086"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1152832"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Platform Dev for Meal Delivery System </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 14, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Within six months we were able to rebuild the system to implement an internationally unique way of personalizing meal orders. The <b>implementation went without major complications</b>, and we are looking forward to the business effects of the changes made. Quickly understanding our product and business model, which is not an easy thing to do. We have had experiences with suppliers who proposed solutions before they fully understood the challenge. This was avoided in the case of Memory Squared, and as a result, we decided to entrust them with further product development as well.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/memory-squared/172086"
            title="View Memory Squared Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="172086"
            data-gtm_insight_id="1152832"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

      target="_blank"

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Rebuild &amp; Redesign for Software Solutions Company
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Memory Squared has rebuilt an Android and iOS app from scratch for a custom software solutions company. The team has used React Native, created the client's app backend, and is currently building
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/memory-squared/359084"
          title="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on Memory Squared"
          class="provider-insight__highlight-more-link"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Patient
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Guaraná Technologies received commendations for their patience throughout the project, particularly from a first-time technology entrepreneur. The client noted that the team remained responsive and understanding despite several project delays and changes, stating, &#39;The whole Guarana team... was very patient with me.&#39; The overall sentiment reflects satisfaction with their ability to educate and support the client without judgment, further enhancing the collaboration experience.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="39249"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1698211"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS MVP Development for Lifestyle Startup</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 8, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The whole Guarana team—and the project manager especially—was very <b>patient with me</b>. As a first-time technology entrepreneur who’s bootstrapping the project as a solo founder, I had to start and stop the project a few times, sometimes for months, before we actually wrote any code. Although we were able to joke about it, they remained as <b>responsive as the first time I called</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

            <p
                    title="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
                    aria-label="Read Full Review on Appinventiv"
                    class="provider__description-text-more  project-highlight-text"
                    data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Proactive
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised Appinventiv for their proactive approach throughout the project lifecycle. For instance, one client highlighted their &#39;remarkable ability to collaborate closely&#39; and &#39;proactively address potential challenges,&#39; ensuring a smooth development process. Another noted their &#39;quick turnaround&#39; on issues and consistent availability for feedback, reinforcing their commitment to client success. Overall, the sentiment reflects strong approval of Appinventiv&#39;s proactive problem-solving and responsiveness, distinguishing them as a reliable partner in app development.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="275422"
          data-gtm_insight_id="711510"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">iOS App Development for Photography Marketplace</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 13, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What stood out most about Appinventiv was their exceptional ability to blend technical expertise with <b>proactive problem-solving</b>. Their team not only delivered high-quality work but also <b>anticipated and addressed potential challenges efficiently</b>, making the entire development process smooth and effective.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accessible
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding accessibility for Groovy Technoweb Pvt. Ltd. is highly positive. Clients consistently praise the company&#39;s availability and responsiveness, noting that team members, particularly Mr. Sagar Patel, are always ready to assist regardless of time zones. One client remarked that they felt like they had an &#39;in-house&#39; team due to the constant communication and support provided. This accessibility has been crucial in fostering strong collaboration and ensuring project success.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Loonar Studios for their timely service delivery and efficient communication. One reviewer highlighted the &#39;speed and quality of their service&#39; as particularly impressive, indicating a strong commitment to meeting project deadlines. Overall, the sentiment regarding timeliness is highly positive, with no noted delays or negative experiences reported by clients.
      </p>

                Open to feedback
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Mobilenani demonstrated a strong openness to feedback throughout the project, as highlighted by the client&#39;s experience of consistent communication and responsiveness to suggestions. The team effectively addressed feedback, although there were minor delays during the testing phase. The client noted that although earlier structured testing could have improved efficiency, the team&#39;s swift resolution of issues showcased their commitment to quality and client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2432206"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="314766"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1992392"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">AR/VR Mobile Game Development for Gaming Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--service-line">

    <ul class="features">

  </li>
  
  <li class="features__item">
    $10,000 – $49,000 avg. project cost
  </li>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Dev for Software Dev &amp; Design House
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  Makimo helped a software development and design company with their mobile app development. The goal was to provide end users new functions with the use of ML.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Transparent
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised MintyMint for their transparency throughout the project lifecycle. One client noted, &#39;They are always transparent about costs and hourly estimations,&#39; which reflects their commitment to clear communication. Additionally, the open dialogue established from the beginning has allowed for the effective resolution of any issues that arose. Overall, the sentiment regarding transparency is highly positive, with clients feeling well-informed and supported during their collaborations.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Well-organized projects
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed strong satisfaction regarding the well-organized project management of Inmost. One CEO noted the effective communication through weekly stand-up calls and daily emails, which facilitated a smooth workflow. They highlighted the stability of the Inmost team as a key factor in their project&#39;s success, emphasizing that this consistency minimized retraining needs. Overall, feedback reflects a highly positive sentiment towards Inmost&#39;s structured approach and team cohesion, contributing to efficient project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1520499"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="89735"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1863159"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Wine Sales Agency</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 23, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              From a metrics perspective, we’ve been working together quite efficiently. We keep our sprints on the shorter side, but sometimes we’ll have sprints that’ll last anywhere from 2–3 weeks, so we keep a high degree of communication. As soon as we finish the sprint, testing, and review, we move on to the next one. <b>We have a day-to-day communication via email, and a stand-up call once per week where we discuss any open items, questions, future sprints, and challenges related to integrating different platforms into the app.</b>
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

      <p class="provider-insight__description">

Ecobank emphasized that they did not exceed the budget or timeline, while Ukrgasbank appreciated that development stayed true to their project timelines. This consistent feedback indicates that Softensy is reliable in delivering projects on schedule.

Clients emphasized their ability to ask the right questions and maintain clear communication throughout projects, often working late to meet deadlines. One client noted, &#34;They are professionals at what they do,&#34; while another stated, &#34;Their professionalism and expertise... are truly unique.&#34; Overall, clients feel confident in Postindustria&#39;s technical capabilities and project management, expressing satisfaction with their rigorous approach and high-quality deliverables.

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Innovative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a strong sentiment of innovation regarding AppWorks Software House, highlighting their ability to develop comprehensive and unique software solutions. One client noted that AppWorks never indicated that any requirement was impossible, effectively integrating their unique business model into a cohesive system. Additionally, the client emphasized that the custom ERP system significantly optimized their operations, showcasing AppWorks&#39; innovative approach to problem-solving and continuous improvement.
      </p>
    </div>

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web Dev & Mobile App Dev for Gas Distributor</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 22, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I think the most impressive thing was that we never heard from any AppWorks team member that something is impossible. Gas distribution is no rocket science, but our business model is quite unique and <b>they basically managed to cover the Karo’s activity in an integrated environment where everything works together and saves us tons of time without a stutter</b>. We have big plans for new modules in the system and we have no doubt AppWorks will meet our expectations.
            </p>

        Reviews mention Professional
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praise Syntech Software for their professionalism and responsiveness. One CEO noted their project managers were &#39;awesome&#39; and provided an &#39;A&#43;&#43;&#43;&#39; rating for their communication and follow-through. The successful integration of a legacy system into a functional ERP tool was highlighted, along with the team&#39;s ability to maintain professionalism despite initial language barriers. Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with no significant areas for improvement identified.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Timely
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall sentiment regarding Codenauts&#39; timeliness is highly positive. Clients consistently noted that Codenauts delivered milestones on time and maintained precise project management. For instance, one client emphasized that their project ended as planned with no negative surprises, while another highlighted the punctual delivery of their MVP. Additionally, communication was tailored to project needs, ensuring timely responses and adjustments. This level of reliability has significantly contributed to clients&#39; satisfaction with Codenauts&#39; services.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

            </div>

    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>

%20content,%20producing%20explainer%20videos,%20product%20walkthroughs,%20commercials,%20and%20app%20videos.%20Their%20videos%20have%20generated%20over%201.3%20billion%20views,%20making%20their%20videos%20widely%20recognized%20across%20the%20globe.%20From%20concept%20to%20post-production,%20including%20scriptwriting,%20storyboarding,%20and%20motion%20graphics,%20Vidico%20delivers%20end-to-end%20video%20solutions%20that%20help%20challenger%20brands%20grow%20and%20engage%20their%20audiences.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/signature-video-group%22%20target=%22%22%3ESignature%20Video%20Group%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Toronto,%20Canada%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20Undisclosed%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2044%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Signature%20Video%20Group%20(SVG)%20is%20a%20Toronto-based%20video%20production%20company%20and%20content%20agency%20specializing%20in%20creating%20impactful%20visual%20stories.%20They%20produce%20a%20wide%20range%20of%20video%20content,%20including%20broadcast%20commercials,%20branded%20documentaries,%20corporate%20communications,%20product%20demos,%20and%20training%20videos.%20SVG%20collaborates%20with%20clients%20to%20craft%20campaigns%20that%20drive%20business%20results,%20attract%20top%20talent,%20and%20simplify%20complex%20ideas.%3C/li%3E%0A%0A%20%20%3Cli%3E%3Cstrong%3E%3Ca%20href=%22https://clutch.co/profile/snowy-peak-films%22%20target=%22%22%3ESnowy%20Peak%20Films%3C/a%3E%3C/strong%3E%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EHQ%20Location:%3C/strong%3E%20Denver,%20CO%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EAvg.%20Hourly%20Rate:%3C/strong%3E%20$100%20-%20$149%20/%20hr%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3E#%20of%20Reviews:%3C/strong%3E%2041%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20%3Cstrong%3EReview%20Rating:%3C/strong%3E%205.0%3Cbr%3E%0A%20%20Snowy%20Peak%20Films%20is%20a%20Denver-based%20video%20production%20and%20animation%20company%20known%20for%20blending%20creativity%20with%20strategic%20insight.%20They%20specialize%20in%20crafting%20videos%20that%20fit%20seamlessly%20into%20broader%20marketing%20campaigns,%20focusing%20on%20maximizing%20client%20ROI%20and%20engagement.%20With%20expertise%20spanning%20directing,%20cinematography,%20editing,%20and%20animation,%20the%20Snowy%20Peak%20team%20collaborates%20closely%20with%20clients%20to%20ensure%20each%20project%20aligns%20with%20their%20vision%20and%20brand.%3C/li%3E%0A%3C/ol%3E%0A%0A%3Ch3%3ESelection%20Criteria:%20Popular%202D%20Animation%20Agencies%3C/h3%3E%0A%0AClutch%20makes%20it%20easy%20to%20find%20and%20connect%20with%20the%20best%202D%20animation%20companies%20in%20the%20world.%20The%20Clutch%20Leaders%20Matrix%20provides%20a%20broad%20view%20of%20top%202D%20animation%20agencies,%20each%20company%20featured%20is%20evaluated%20on%20specific%20criteria.%20This%20robust%20criteria%20includes%20Area%20of%20Focus%20and%20Ability%20to%20Deliver.%20Area%20of%20Focus%20accounts%20for%20a%20company%E2%80%99s%20specialization%20within%20a%20certain%20service.%20Ability%20to%20Deliver%20includes%20client%20reviews,%20past%20projects,%20market%20presence%20and%20reputation%20in%20the%20industry.%20Each%202D%20animation%20firm%20must%20provide%20evidence%20of%20successfully%20completed%20projects%20for%20previous%20clients,%20validating%20the%20project%20occurred%20and%20the%20details%20of%20the%20engagement%20are%20valid.&nbsp;%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EAppearances%20in%20the%20Leaders%20Matrix%20are%20not%20paid%20placements;%20companies%20cannot%20pay%20to%20be%20included.%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3ENote:%20This%20list%20was%20last%20updated%20on%20November%2026,%202024.%3C/div%3E"}]},{"p":"^\\/agencies\\/digital-design$","m":[{"id":"2kza5oe-m432sgnt","s":".directory-header__description-text","m":0,"ce":"Digital%20design%20has%20been%20the%20backbone%20of%20the%20online%20world!%20Agencies%20that%20offer%
